hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #0# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Prelude of Light#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern GS Vines Above Stairs

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Forest Temple#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that racing #Damp√©'s ghost# rewards...^ #Din's Fire# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial First Right Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: When ASM is used to code a randomizer they should call it ASMR.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #symphony in the Spirit Temple# yields #a Bomb Bag#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Symphony Room Chest

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Big Poe Bottle# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Blue Fire Arrows# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #Farore's Wind#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Chest Switch Chest

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: It would be a shame if something... unfortunate... were to happen to you.^Have you considered saving lately?

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Shadow Temple#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #a Purple Rupee# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.
